name: Cloak and Chat
description:
Cloak and Chat is a game submitted for the Brackeys' Game Jam 2022.2.

In Cloak and Chat you play as well, Cloak and Chat. They enter a mysterious house and have to escape through, but something says they aren't alone...

(FYI for the start, press E to enter through the door and C when you're in the house to switch to Chat to see the white board :) )
